Text.val: 07.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.07.2008 SH SCR13792 Added buttons "Adjustment" and "MQ59 details"
26.07.2007 SH SCR11925 Adjusted argument list of client selection program
13.07.2007 SH SCR12638 Replaced test CLAC_DATEBOOKED > date() - 180 with

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select CLAC_NO, CLAC_DATEBOOKED, min(CLAC_DATECLIENTLIST), min(CLAC_ADJUSTMENT), cast(sum(CADB_BALANCEOVERDUE407DAYS + CADB_BALANCELIMITEXCEEDED + CADB_BALANCEOTHERDEDUCTION) as decimal(8)), min(CLAC_CURRENCY), cast(count(*) -sum(ABS(SIGN(CADB_LINENO-1))) as decimal (9)), min(CLAC_JOURNALNO_ICA), min(CLAC_INTR_NO) from :1/CLAC Left outer join :1/CADB on CADB_CLAC_NO = CLAC_NO where CLAC_ADMNO = :2 and CLAC_CLNTNO = :3 and CLAC_DATEBOOKED is not null group by CLAC_DATEBOOKED, CLAC_NO order by CLAC_DATEBOOKED desc, CLAC_NO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- If the users select an other client then the tabular view has to be closed
immed and has to be restarted for the new entered client
